account_id.description: Indicates the ID of the target account.

created_at.description: Indicates the date and time when an invitation (handshake) request was made.

invitation_id.description: Specifies the unique ID of an invitation (handshake).

leave_organization_on_destroy.description: Specifies whether to leave the organization when delete the invitation (handshake).

master_account_id.description: Indicates the unique ID of the organization's management account.

master_account_name.description: Indicates the name of the organization's management account.

organization_id.description: Indicates the ID of the organization.

status.description: Indicates the current state of the invitation (handshake).

updated_at.description:
Indicates the date and time when an invitation (handshake) request was accepted,
cancelled, declined, or expired.

urn.description: Indicates the uniform resource name of the invitation
